BlackFortress:

One of the Blast shooted by Darkhawk hit the main control p=
annel and as a security measure the Fortress started to araise. Meanwhile a=
 familiar signature darkened by a predacon program could be picked up. Reve=
aling that Darkhawk is truly Windlord 




On Sat, Apr 10, 2010 at 11:50 PM=
, Sandy <magicquartz@...> wrote:

    
  Location: Black Fortress.

 =
 Nightshift, Tucson Prime, Rat Trap and Quickstride.

  Inside the fortress=
:

  Night Shift is almost caught by surprise by his own shiruken and manag=
es to swerve around it, with a screech in his tires. He was hoping to get o=
ne of the enemies to shoot at him,thinking that by mistake they may just bl=
ast one of the control pannels that controls the fortress accidentally, thu=
s allowing him to slip out. With his night vision he spots a main control p=
annel, and realizes that Scorponok is shooting at him with the plasma canno=
ns, as is Scourge, who is content on trying to fry his carborator. He remai=
ns quiet, yet continues to speed around the room, hoping that at least one =
of them would take the bait. He wasn't running scared, he was clearly up to=
 something strategic. He thinks to himself.

  " I knew you bozos were stup=
id enough ta buy inta me. That's it, keep shootn' my way, eventually I'm go=
nna make a move toward one of them power boxes and then whoops, someone's g=
onna hit somethn' by accident."

  He sends a silent com to Lord Elder.

  =
" Nightshift reportn' in Sir. I'm fine, just gettn' the chase of a lifetime=
 in here, nothn' serious. I got a few dings on the fenders but nothn' that =
can't be banged out with a hammer. Look, guys, I ain't found Nightlight, Ro=
dimus or Windlord, but I'm kinda playn' a game of catn' mouse with the badd=
ies. Hopn' ta get one of them ta mess up'n hit a power box by accident, ins=
tead of hittn' me... OHHHH SCRAP!"

  He screeches loudly as he avoids anot=
her close call with a plasma blast.

  "That was almost my left front tire,=
 close one. Anyway, I really could use a hand in here, I dunno how much lon=
ger my fuel reserves are gonna hold out. I'm at about a half a tank now, an=
d the way I'm gon' here, that ain't gonna take long ta go through... Gotta =
burn rubber, talk later, Nightshift out."

  Outside the fortress, Tucson P=
rime comes out of his trance. He holds his chest for just a moment.

  "Sor=
ry guys, I didn't mean to frighten you. I just got quite the wakeup call. W=
e need to get into that fortress but first we need to short out the control=
 pannel that keeps it beneath that magma pool."

  Rat Trap shrugs. 

  "Lo=
rd Elder did mention somethn' about blastn' inta the pool, but we ain't got=
 that kinda fire power on us."

  Tuscon grins confidently.

  "That's all =
right, I do. Stand back, the first step to bringing light to a black flame,=
 is to create a backdraft. On second thought, I better do this in vehicle m=
ode. I can assure your saftey better than being in robot mode."

  He trans=
forms into his missile truck mode, and opens his doors to his cab.

  "Lord=
 Elder, I'm back, just needed to consult someone as to my next move. It's m=
y first day on the job as a Prime and I needed a little inside advice. And =
I got it. Kup, I also read you, and I'm going to expidite this mission a bi=
t. It's dragged on far too long. Time for action not beating around the rot=
ary."

  He lines himself up for the shot and aims both missile carriers at=
 the pool, targeting not in the center of the pool, but a slight before get=
ting to the middle of the magma chamber. Rat Trap and Quickstride buckle in=
, to anticipate the major kick back Tucson's missile launchers may have. Th=
en, Tucson fires, as they kick back, causing him to lurch backward slightly=
 as he gets used to firing them at the same time.

  "Ughh, felt that.. Are=
 you two okay?"

  Rat Trap is now on top of Quickstride, who is now lookin=
g to the control pannel.

  "Umm, we're - okay.. Just a little - bit shell =
shocked. Wowwww... Talk about kick back... It wasn't like ya didn't warn us=
 because ya did but we weren't expecting that..."

  Rat Trap rubs his head=
.

  "Yeah, talk about the big bang theory."

  Tucson rolls forward just a=
 slight.

  " It even kicked me back a few feet. I have to learn to ground =
my tires when I use those missiles. Sorry about that."

  Rat Trap gets bac=
k into his seat and buckles up.

  "So, how are we gonna get through this?
=

  Tucson parks himself safely waiting for the results of his launch.

  " =
We're going to relight the dark flame. I have the power within me, the powe=
r of the Matrix. The dark flame, represents Rodimus, who's armor is black a=
s pitch and flaming paint job dimmed to a drap pale color. That's the fire =
I need to rekindle."

  Rat Trap gasps as does Quickstride.

  "But Wheels,=
 that might that might do a number on ya."

  Tuscon sighs.

  " I know Rat=
 Trap, it will. I'll still be a Prime no matter what happens, but if all go=
es well, we will get Rodimus back and Cyclonus will pay for his deeds again=
st Primus. It's worth the risk my friends, it's worth the risk."

  Rat Tra=
p sheds a tear.

  "But but what if it kills ya? What's Talon gonna do with=
out ya? What am I gonna do without ya? Wheels, you're the only real friend =
I ever did have. I don't wanna lose ya."

  Tucson could feel a tear drip o=
n his dashboard. 

  " I promise you Rat Trap, neither Talon or you is goin=
g to lose me that easilly. I may be out of commission for a few days, but i=
t's not going to kill me. Remember when we talked about the most powerful f=
orce in the universe? How nothing could ever surpass that?"

  Rat Trap nod=
ds.

  " I think so. Ya told me that love is a force no one can reckon with=
. Nothing breaks the bond of friendship no matter how powerful evil becomes=
. Love knows no boundaries and is the only infinite force that keeps on liv=
ing even when one has passed on long ago."

  Tucson gently straps Rat Trap=
 in more securely.

  "That's right Rat Trap. Remember that. It's our bond =
as friends that can never be broken. All of us, including Talon, Elita, Kup=
, Lord Elder, Depthcharge, Lord Perseus, Legacy, Guardia, and Ravenchief ha=
ve the power within ourselves not because of tyranical strength, but becaus=
e of that one thing that neither Hydras, Megatron or Galvatron ever had. An=
d that was True Love. They rule with force, not with compassion. Our heart =
is what is going to win us this battle, our hearts are going to come togeth=
er as one and we will save those that need to be saved, and rekindle the li=
ghts that have nearly been blown out."

  He starts up his engines.

  " NO=
W, LET'S DO THIS! FOR RODIMUS PRIME!"

  Rat Trap and Quickstride join in.
=

  "FOR RODIMUS PRIME, LEADER OF THE AUTOBOTS!"

  Tucson fires several mor=
e rounds into the magma.



  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, <airly2002@...=
> wrote:
  >

  > Kup:
  > 
  > "We must take out Nightshift, perhaps if we=
 overcharge the Blackfortress circuits we can araise it, our main focus is =
Rescue nightshift if we can capture Rodimus, Nighlight and or windlord will=
 be a bonus... it must be done from inside"Kup open a com link to Nightshif=
t and said "Nightshift do you copy?"
  > 
  > 
  > From: Preston Carroll 
 =
 > Sent: Saturday, April 10, 2010 6:12 PM
  > To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
 =
 > Subject: Re: BlackFortress
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > Who: LORD ELDER
  > Locati=
on: The Ark - Command center
  > 
  > > "We will be risking as well Rodimus=
, Windlord and Nightlight "Said Kup by comlink"If only we know where are th=
ey... is the only way to araise the blackFortress?"
  > 
  > Elder nodded s=
adly as he received the transmission, "You're right, it
  > might hurt the =
folks we're trying to rescue." He sighed slightly as he
  > continued, "By =
training I am a guardian and sentinel, not the soldiers
  > and tactical sp=
ecialists that you are."
  > 
  > He shrugged, clearly at a loss as to how =
to help, "Perhaps you can
  > find a way to dig? It's a lot of heat down th=
ere though, I don't know.
  > Kup you have been in a lot of battle, clearly=
 more than I have, don't
  > you have any ideas?"
  > 
  > (TAG)
  > 
  > P=
reston
  >
